bibl.title: Theophoric Personal Names in Graeco-Roman Egypt. The Case of Sarapis. Avec résumé en anglais.

series.title: Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete
ArchPF

bibl.note: [Introduction.] - 1. The Database. - 2. Using the Database for Quantification. - 3. The Earliest Examples. - 4. Sarapis and Serapis. - 5. The Greekness of the Names. - 6. Social Spread. - 7. Sarapis Names in Family Traditions. - 8. The Christian Name Sarapion. - 9. The Compound Names Sarapammon, Sarap(i)odoros and Philosarapis. - 10. The Hypocoristics Sarapas, Sarapous and Saras.
